SELECT cs.fMachineGroup AS "machineGroup", cs.fTerminalType AS "terminalType", SUM(IF(DATE_ADD(cs.fLastVisitTime, INTERVAL IF(10 > cs.fPageNo * 3, 15, cs.fPageNo * 3 + 5) MINUTE) < NOW(), 1, 0)) AS 'unworkMachineCount', SUM(cs.fIdleTotalMinutes) AS "idleTotalMinutes", COUNT(1) AS 'totalMachineCount' FROM t_machine_info cs WHERE cs.fValid = 1
AND cs.fTerminalType = #{criteria.terminalType}
AND cs.fMachineGroup like '${criteria.machineGroup}%' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_customer_keyword ck WHERE ck.fType = #{criteria.entryType} AND ck.fMachineGroup like '${criteria.machineGroup}%')
GROUP BY cs.fMachineGroup, cs.fTerminalType
